summary: Camila is now a beautifull follower or replacer
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][size=4][b]Hi, this mod add a follower ( Camila ) and replaces the original NPC (Camilla Valerius) with a more beautiful one.
In addition, original Camilla, can be chosen as a follower  *** .

Both were created in CK, verified with TES5Edit and tested in the game.
I'm sorry for my English![/b][/size]


***  If you can not recruit her, try this:
make anyone your follower (https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15805/)
is a simple text, paste it into the data folder, open the console, point to Camila and write "bat makefollower".
I'm working to fix it.


[u][b]Requirements: [/b][/u]

ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_6_Full:  https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168

[/size]
[size=3][u][b]Specifications:[/b][/u]

* Vanilla Follower and Replacer.
* You can use your favorite texture package, they will adapt very well.
* Runs over all DLC.
* Replacer does not have a specific combat class, but supports Light Armor, Bow, One Hand and Sneak.
* Follower is a assassin class.
* Both level with player from 10 to 150.
* Replacer lives in Riverwood & Camila inside Sleeping [/size][size=3][size=3]Giant [/size]Inn.

[size=4][b]Feel free to send me photos.[/b][/size]


[/size][size=3]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/HcJ9Emq.jpg[/img]


[/size]
[size=3][size=4][i][b]Thanks to Nexus community and Bethesda !!![/b][/i][/size]

[/size]
author: damelamochi
